document.full_text: deutsche bank  is planning to restructure its u.s. operations to skirt financial regulations that could force it to raise billions of dollars, the wall street journal reported on its website on tuesday.
document.title: deutsche bank to restructure u.s. operations: report
lines_and_colors: deutsche bank  is planning to restructure its u.s. operations to skirt financial regulations that could force it to raise billions of dollars, the wall street journal reported on its website on tuesday.
